text: On the IBM Blockchain platform for Hyperledger, when I select the "Network" tab, I can see hashes for chaincode under the Chaincode ID section. How can I tell which chaincode this is running/linked to?

attachments.title: IBM Blockchain (Hyperledger) - "Error when deploying chaincode"
attachments.text: I'm following the instructions to deploy some chaincode to the IBM Hyperledger Blockchain, using the swagger API on the IBM Bluemix <http://dashboard.In|dashboard.In> order to deploy some chaincode, I need to submit a...
